comment: The class was easy because I was really interested in the reading material. You must read to pass. There is a 250 word discussion every week and you must respond to two classmates there is also a quiz every week. Tests were online. Everything was easily graded if you just did the work.

This class has been by far my favorite class in my four years of college and she has been my favorite professor. If you are going into the HS department, she is a great ally. She offers undergraduate and graduate classes and the class is an easy A if you go to class. There were two papers and a presentation and those are your major grades-no exams
One of the best teachers I have had.  Discussions make you think outside of the box.  She is funny and down to earth.  Attendance is a must.

This class wasn't what I was expecting, but I enjoyed this class. Exams are online,  she gives you class time to work on group projects, and paper is long but not difficult. Dr. Robinson-Dooley gives plenty of extra credit to boost your grade

I loved this class and professor. She gets the class involved and though her assignments are rigid, she is there to help along the way. There was a lot of group work. You need to attend class. Not too much studying but there are readings to do. And make sure you actually do the reading and high light stuff because you will need it for your papers.

One of the best online classes I've ever taken. Keep up with your discussion posts and don't just look at the PP,  listen to the lecture. Be very  specific in discussions and use correct APA citations. Her weekly update videos are awesome and lets you know she's actually reading the posts. Kind of wish I had taken her in person. Awesome class
Make sure to do your discussion posts and cite your sources!
Make sure you cite your sources (APA) in discussion posts-a lot of people seemed to have an issue with this in my online class. Know the material and you will do good!

The best ever! She's very experienced and educated, and really gets the class involved. This is an eye opening experience, and I learned a lot. You will have to attend and participate in class, but you will enjoy. There is a group project, a few readings, a book report, and some other assignments. She will make you earn your grade. Follow syllabus!

Super easy class. A lot of group work throughout the semester. One big group project at the end of the semester, but as long as you have a good group you'll be okay. She doesn't lecture and doesn't give exams as long as the class is reading the articles she posts. Easy A. Nice lady.

Consistent with an upper-level course. Weekly discussion were fairly easy -- make sure to hit the word count and reference text. Test are few and highlight the text (easy enough). While Dr. R/D is very helpful... allow for a day or two for response to inquiries and make sure to scan the syllabus/rubrics before asking a question.
What  a great professor!!! If you have the opportunity take her, you will learn how to be cultural competent in your profession.  Very polite and awesome personality.  The BEST

She's great! Very understanding and fair in grading. Provides grading scales so you know how to make high grades. Online discussion post due every week. Ungraded quizzes to help you for exams. Does voice over ppts. One APA style paper and one group paper. Very straight forward and to the point. Must read chapters to write the discussion post.

I absolutely LOVE Dr.Robinson-Dooley!! She is extremely helpful and makes you want to go to class. She doesn't give busywork and is always willing to help. Just go to class, participate,do the work, and you'll pass. My favorite professor is the HS department!!

She was a really good teacher. She makes you think about things you normally wouldn't. Her midterm and final are online and crazy easy. There's a presentation at the end of the semester but's it's actually really fun. She does an activity in the mid semester that is fun too. Everyone should take her class!!!!!
